title: Man kills himself after shooting a mother and her daughter at Taylor Sportsplex (UPDATED)
content:
A man is dead and a mother and her young daughter are critically injured after a shooting Thursday night outside the Taylor Sportsplex, 13333 Telegraph Road.
Police Chief Mary Sclabassi said police said the shooting took place at about 7:50 p.m. and appears to be a murder suicide. She said a man shot the woman and young girl and then shot and killed himself in the parking lot.
The relationship between the man and his victims had not yet been identified, Sclabassi said.
According to Mayor Rick Sollars, the woman, in her 20s, and her 6-year-old daughter were transported to Beaumont Hospital – Dearborn. The girl has since been life-flighted to Mott Children's Hospital on the University of Michigan medical campus, Sollars said.
At around 10 p.m. Sclabassi said the crime scene had been contained and the building was closed early as authorities continue their investigation.
News-Herald staff contributed to this report.
